segments.text: The new computer software is driving me crazy ! I really need a break !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you mean , Carol . I ’ Ve had nothing but trouble with it . They say it ’ s supposed to be easy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s what I ’ Ve heard . But as far as I ’ m concerned , it takes a genius to figure it out . Can you pass the sugar , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Why don ’ t you sit down for a minute ? You haven ’ t taken a rest all morning .
segments.speaker: S2
